38544037.review:

看电脑有个自动生成，不知道什么样，把100关重新通一边再说。

38313732.review: I've played through this game a few times, and will play it more. I love it! As the title says, it's a tranquil game. I like to play while watching (listening to) TV.

36633678.review: Very nice puzzle game with a good balance between doable and challenging. With a good bit of trial and error you can eventually solve every puzzle without the game ever becoming tear-your-hair-out-frustrating like others in this genre. And if you want an extra challenge, there are a boatload of generated levels to play.

36166385.review:
刚进入游戏的时候以为option里面的reset data是恢复初始设定，打到一半手贱了一下，哭到半夜……
刚进入游戏的时候以为自己用不到色盲模式，玩到八十多关，向色盲势力低头……
刚进入游戏的时候以为它很容易全成就，打通一百关后看了眼成就列表……
【我真是天下第一大糊涂蛋.jpg】
总体而言还是一款非常有趣的益智休闲小游戏啦QAQ

36060055.review: This game is exactly what it says on the label.  You swap tiles around on a board to make sure that all loops on the tiles are connected.  The puzzles start easy and slowly grow in difficulty.  Unlike some puzzle games, you can redo puzzles from earlier levels any time you want to.  The music is serene and soothing, and the puzzles are pretty.   I find I can pick this up, play for half an hour, then come back days or weeks later when I'm in the mood.   it's a wonderful resource to have.

36039401.review: Wonderful and soothing - no timer, no pressure, nothing keeping track of how many clicks it takes you to finish a puzzle. The procedurally generated levels are harder, but incredibly satisfying to finish. I like to play it before bed, when I'm trying to unwind.

35587724.review: This is a great game, really satisfying and chill...it challenges you but doesn't stress you out.

35220180.review: Just as the title suggests, LOOP is a very tranquil game. You can spend many hours solving the thousands of puzzles that await you. Listen to the lovely soundtrack and try to put the tiles in place to complete the beautiful patterns. In case of one of the generated levels being too hard, just skip it to avoid frustration.

33551872.review: A very simple, relaxed game that still ramps up to an interesting challenge.

33475265.review:
LOOP is the game for people who suffer from anxiety, an overly chaotic mind or stress.

As someone who deals with too many voices in my head as well as just a bunch of noise, this game is brilliant and allowing the mind to just focus on fairly logical tasks. The aim of the game is to complete the loops by moving (and in some cases, rotating) tiles. It's something to take your time with and a game that is unlikely to cause any frustration.

Definitely worth it if you're someone that needs help calming down.

33358870.review:
游戏挺耐玩的，而且不会给人很大的压迫感，让人因为解不出来而急躁。考虑到关卡数量，我认为还是值得一卖的。
但很想问一下这种一上来就关卡全开放的游戏，reset键有什么意义？？打到五十多关时想试一下色盲模式，把reset当成set按了，现在为了成就要从头打起……

33312290.review:
很喜欢这类半解谜半休闲类型的小游戏，
看了介绍就很想买了，夏促虽然没到史低还是直接入了。
玩法很简单，但是如果没掌握好一定的窍门还是比较麻烦的。
[spoiler]注意每个六边形上的连接点，先把只能放在角落和边上的块放在大致的位置之后再微调。[/spoiler]
前面花的时间还挺多的，后面一关应该不到5分钟的样子。
看着原本杂乱无章的线条通过简单的推理和整理变得通畅自如，成就感还是蛮高的。
PS：10亿关真的可怕……但是1000关全成就我还是有一定信心的！
2017.11.23更新：
玩了很久，仍然没有通关，8月份换电脑存档丢了，不过当时也只玩到50多关，所以还好，
只是之后就只在想要静下心的时候才玩1-2关。是的，这个游戏就是能够让人静下心来。
不同于其他游戏，不仅仅是在完成一关的时候所有的链接形成闭路的一瞬间才觉得通畅，
这个过程更能够让大脑冷静下来，让思维不再混乱，这个过程才有一种美感。

33163764.review: This is a good game if you like to chill and solve puzzles.

32669929.review: For the price, this game is definitely worth it. Even after the initial 100 "levels," there are tons more made possible from a generator. I can contnuously come back to this game when I feel like it and play newly generated puzzles each time. I also recommend the game due to its ease in coming back to play after a break (since it is casual).

32146421.review:
[i]这是一款拥有一百万关的游戏
这是一款打到一千关才解锁最终成就的游戏
（全球2%的达成率是怎么回事！大家都这么[strike]闲得慌[/strike]锲而不舍吗）
归根到底，这是一款把人搞成蚊香眼 (இдஇ`) 的游戏[/i]

官网上放出了[url=https://jcvsmc.itch.io/loop]免费DEMO[/url]，可以先试试再决定要不要入。

规则很简单：若干六边形的拼图块，上面画满了纠缠盘绕的曲线段，你需要通过两两对换、旋转、变色等操作，让所有曲线都构成首尾衔接的环——游戏名字LOOP就是这么来的。玩过之后发现，有些题目解法不是唯一的， 只要符合上述规则就算通过。和普通拼图类似，也是先找边角，然后慢慢往中间发展。

根据[url=http://loopthegame.com/]官网介绍[/url]，开发者想做个充满禅意、宁静平和的冥想游戏，所以它既没有时间或步数限制，也不设得分，方便人们放松地专注于解谜本身。基于这点，游戏设计还是比较友好的：

+ 初始的100关，上来就完全开放，无需费力解锁
+ 舒缓的音乐，沙沙的雨声音效，可以分别调节音量大小
+ 界面设计干净简洁，没有干扰
+ 在关卡生成器中，输入0-999999之间任一数字，得到海量附加关
+ 考虑到特殊需求玩家，还有色盲模式

- 唯一不方便的是，一次操作只能影响1-2块拼图，有时候已经拼好了一大片，发现整体位置偏了，却无法全选拖拽，还得一块一块换过去。

适合：慢节奏的解谜控，极简主义爱好者。莫名感觉喜欢数独的也会喜欢这个，虽然玩久了都是套路，但闲来无事搞一局还不错。

31641656.review: Great game to either relax, or to focus before an activty. It's like trying to create a puzzle based on the back sided of the pieces. A nice twist that keeps me entertained.

31227420.review: Prise de tête relaxante dotée d'une excellente durée de vie. Parfait.

30785361.review: A nice puzzle game with no real pressures.  It's you vs the loop level and that's it.  Later levels do become rather head scratching with all the pieces to work with.  Custom levels also give more replay value after you finish the default levels.

30280217.review:
Noeuds et Tresses d'apparence simple, à rattacher par couleurs = excellent pour le cogito... 
Puzzles générés en quasi-infini !!

29999293.review: A very calm, tranquil game.  Since in the game you swap pieces that don't fit, you don't have to worry as much about failure to finish the puzzle.  The object is then a jigsaw puzzle with all the same outer shape, just matching the patterns on the surface.

29278407.review: not the best puzzle game out there but pretty damn good

29160142.review: 这个游戏真的挺休闲的，玩的不亦乐乎，如果便宜一点就更好了

28970954.review:
A great puzzle game when you want to unwind for a bit. 100 set levels to work through and a random level generator with a billion or so if you need more. You're never going to run out of puzzles basically. Rules are simple, just use logic, elimination and swap the tiles around to try piece the coloured loops together correctly. Starts easy and gradually adds new elements to content with to add on difficulty. No timer, so can go at your own pace.

The only thing I'd recommend is turning off the default background music (it's generic rain sounds which kind of get old) and put on your own soundtrack to suit your mood.

1000000000000000000/10

28724002.review: i love this game so much, after all the shooters and violent games it's nice to just relax and play this 10/10

28321447.review: I must be stupid. This game is amazing, but requires logic. I keep getting stuck lol

25578929.review: Nem tűnik nehéznek, hogy folytonos vonalat csináljunk mindegyik színből, de azért a 100 pályán akadnak gondolkoztatóak. Fokozatosan lettek nehezebbek, eleinte egy szín van csak, de később már több és nagyobb pályák is. Ha ezek elfogynak van pályageneráló. A játék alatt kellemes zene van, a hanghatások is jók, már amennyi egy puzzle játékban van. Nincs számláló, nincs határidő, csak megnyugtató környezet van.

25360251.review:
Loop porte tout simplement bien son nom : un jeu de puzzle tranquille.
Au début simple, petit à petit le niveau se corse en frôlant le diabolique.
Le thème est toujours le même, des boucles difformes de couleurs différentes à reconstituer au début simplement en déplacant les pièces, puis par la suite vous aurez des pieces fixes qui peuvent tourner, soit changer de couleur.
La prise en main est simple, la bande sonore aussi (pas de musique, un petit bruit de pluie en fond, très agréable et sans que cela vous donne envie de faire p... toute les 10 minutes!).

Un bon petit jeu pas cher pour une petite partie rapide quand on a peu de temps, ou juste pour se relaxer après une partie plus prenante sur un autre jeu.

Accessible et adapté pour les enfants dès 6 ans, du moins pour les premiers levels.

24752075.review: If you'll forgive a reference to the "Seinfeld" TV series, this is the "Serenity Now" of puzzle games. Everything feels very tranquil and stress-reducing. But you will find yourself saying <insert your calming mantra here> much more often than you'd have thought. Remember, "Serenity Now, Insanity Later."

24197175.review:
Loop is a wonderfully relaxing and fun puzzle game.  From the soothing musical tones and peaceful designs of the loops, it's the perfect game to play at the end of a long day.

I enjoy the variety of loops available, as well as the range in colour schemes.  It's a well thought-out game that I've played a few times through.  I would love to play more of it if I could.

This is a great, calm game that I highly recommend to all puzzle-lovers, and to anyone needing a calm, soothing activity.  It's brilliant.

24121669.review:
the title and the screenshots speak for themselves: you have to create loops of different colors by switching pieces around. later on you get fixed but rotatable pieces and later still more fixed ones that you can change the color of. there are 100 regular levels and a level generator for nearly endless fun if you so desire.

I found the difficulty of the 100 levels just right, not too easy but not tear-out-my-hair difficult, you can figure them out eventually, though puzzle progress is not saved if you leave a level. you can do them in any order though, all of them are unlocked from the get-go.

the music's ok too but I thought the sound effects were a bit annoying. adding ambient rain sounds to the background was a neat idea though and there are separate volume sliders for all three. the only technical shortcoming on windows is that saves are stored in the registry instead of a separate file.

loop is a simple but cool idea very well executed, it's highly recommended for puzzle fans.

24115481.review: interesting and unique puzzle game .. got in a sale but even at regular price its well worth the money !

23902930.review:
"You'll never guess who just knocked on the door."
'If I'll never guess, then why not just tell me?  If you say I have three guesses, well, then that's a game.'

This quote from the TV series Gotham sums up LOOP.  LOOP is not an actual game.  You just rearrange pieces until, by chance, the puzzle starts to come together.  It's like a jigsaw puzzle, except you don't get to see what the picture is until after you finish the puzzle.  Also, the pieces are all identical in shape, so there's one less indicator that a piece isn't supposed to be adjacent to another piece.

This is an anti-game.  All challenge.  No reward.  It's just mindless busy work.  So, if your favorite part of school is workbooks.  Or your favorite part of work is reading emails.  Or your favorite part of life is waiting to die.  Then don't think twice - buy LOOP now!

What I loved is that Loop is inspired by Zen philosophy with a minimal UI that has no timers, move limit or score. That atmopshere allows you to just relax and focus on the puzzle at hand. No pressure, no stress, just the feeling of simple accomplishment when you finished each level.

You can see my full review at: 

http://www.confidentgamers.com/a-relaxing-puzzler-called-loop/

20142572.review:
First impression: solid puzzle game.

You swap pieces to make loops; some piece can't be swapped, but those can rotate, or they can change color. Like similar games, this is challenging, but not too difficult.

There are 100 handcrafted levels, a level generator, and even an achievement for doing 1000 of these. There's a colorblind mode. The price is right, too.

Recommended.

19211379.review:
This is an interesting puzzle game. It's entertaining enough and the concept is quite cool.

Pros:

- Puzzle concept is fun

- Color choice and art style is pleasant enough.

- Nice and low entry level for even the most casual of players

Cons:

- Difficulty curve is a bit too steep. The first few puzzles are very easy then they throw a very hard one at you!

- Soundtrack is very poor. With a puzzle game like this one, one can really take advantage and have a very pleasant soundtrack, instead they choose to put a rain background. I know some people might find that relaxing, but I would have preferred something more musical.

- A bit expensive, ideally I'd pay closer to 2 or 3 for this as there are comparable free puzzle flash games that are a bit more fun than this one.


All in all I will still give this a thumbs up as the game is very polished and clearly is a good effort by a small development team!

19083748.review:
Very nice game. Challenging puzzles! 
If you love puzzle games, and some of them are easy for you (like Lyne and Ichi or Strata - all three are great games but for me just relaxing and too easy :) ), this could be a nice challenge. 
10/10 :)

18891952.review:
This is an absolutely great chill out puzzler in the same vein as Hexcells, in that the "rules" are very simple, the look and feel is very relaxed and minimal, soothing soundscapes are playing and while the first few puzzles are very easy, the game slowly ramps up the difficulty level without ever making it unfair.
The first many puzzles simply consist of switching around the pieces to form an abstract picture. Later, new types are added, like pieces that can be turned and pieces that can change color.
Definitely check this one out if you need a new chillout puzzle fix!

18531053.review:
I like Kami and Hook, and this one is sort of on those lines. It takes patience and a bit of thinking but I like the feeling that it doesn't really get harder, just more of the same after a certain point. And that makes it more relaxing. 

Just a tip for the higher levels - try to get one color thread right, and the rest just sort of fits in. Bit like a picture puzzle, but without 300 peices of blue sky.

Going back after a break - things I love about Loop:

1. No timer - it really is relaxing.

2. When you finish a puzzle there is the soft ding - nothing more. Nice.

3. After you finish a puzzle, the completed puzzle stays on the screen for as  long as you like untill you click on it to move on.  Very satisfying really. 

4. Very replayable. 

Great Game!

As for the game itself.. it's not fast to get through,  I logged 33 hours and probably 20 to 25 of those were spent actutally playing it, quite a bit of time for only 100 levels, and especially for the price.  The dificulty ramps up nice and steady, there was only one I got really stuck on about level 60ish but theyre were lots that were quite chalanging.  Buy it, you won't refret it.

16235135.review: Addictive, takes a while to beat it. Unless you give up eating, sleeping, etc.etc. sleeping....Zzzzzzz.

16102286.review:
I would have hoped for this puzzle game to be a bit more... puzzly. Most puzzle games that I enjoy require some kind of insight to proceed, or at least, are designed such that strategic thinking is superior to trial and error. You apply logic, derive a pattern and act on it.

This game on the other hand does not reward thinking much. The best strategy seems to be: Find pieces that fit the border (usually this will yield a unique partial solution) and go from there (usually there is a unique way to do so). This took me through the hundred levels in roughly six hours with little cause to reconsider my strategy. It's not super boring (you can listen to music or podcasts in the background) but does not provide an interesting challenge either.

I would have hoped for more clever puzzles. There are topological and graph theoretic insights that levels could be built upon, such as:

• Any cut through the level crosses an even number of lines (of each colour).
• The curvature of each loop must sum up to a multiple of 360°.
• If there are crossings between red and blue lines, then this number of crossings must be even.
• The number of times line segments connect to the left end of a hexagon equals the number of times that a connects to the right (for each colour. the same for the other two directions).

I think it would have been possible to build new mechanics and levels around those mechanics that encourage and reward thinking about these things. Sadly, the existing levels are designed such that considerations of this kind are either useless or more tedious than just applying trial and error.

There are puzzle games out there that convey interesting logical insights and reward the application of them, making the player feel smart when solving a challenge. This is not one of these games.

16087146.review:
Buy it! This game would make a fortune on android and iphone. A good quality game to add to your library. 

Great game for under a fiver.  The puzzles are challenging and require thought, the music and sound effects are really relaxing and the graphics are bright and vivid, with a colour blind option if needed.  The aim is to rotate, swap and change colours and shapes until you get a series of connecting loops, much harder than it sounds.  I've played it for 3 hours and i am about 30% of the way through the game, so great value for money. It is exactly what it says it is a "tranquil puzzle game". 

8/10 - hopefully more updates and puzzles will be added to it.

16055078.review: A smooth, relaxing and challenging puzzle game, I do quite enjoy it

16022803.review:
A very nice puzzle game, lasting for a few hours. Fun puzzles that can get quite intricate, but not impossible to solve with (some help of) methodical approach. No timers, no move counts, and relaxing BGM make the boards feel a lot less like a challenge.

Sadly, there are only 100 boards, with very limited variety of twists to boot. Nonetheless, good puzzle game, would recommend.

15997822.review:
かなりストイックなパズルゲームです。

「Loop」の名の通り、同じ色の紐を「途切れないように」ヘックスを入れ替えて繋げるだけ。
上にある公式動画で紹介されているシステムがパズルルールの全てと言えます。
特にゲーム内で説明されることもありません。ゆえに、英語がわからなくても問題なし。
シナリオのようなものも一切存在しません。

問題数は現段階では100問。
個人的には、最初は簡単過ぎると思いましたが、40問か50問あたりからそれなりに難しくなってきました。

BGMはPVで聞ける一曲のみ。
更に背後に雨音が流れ、SEもその雨音に関連付けたモノ。
演出性としては、この雨音関係が一番大きいですね。悪くないです。
また、BGMと雨音、SEの音量はそれぞれ調節できます。

感覚としては、ペンシルパズルを解くのに近いでしょうか。
自分なりの「解き方」を見つけて、コツコツとやるのが楽しです。

加えて言うと、色盲の方のための専用モード（COLOR BLIND MODE）が存在するので、PVを見て色が見難いと思った人も（多分）問題ありません。

15979910.review:
Serdecznie polecam wszystkim fanom gier logicznych.
Świetna zabawa na długie godziny.

Wonderful gem of a puzzle game.
If you liked Hexcells, you'll like this game as well.

15971246.review: I've liked the Hexcells games in the past, but have been looking for a similar game to scratch the same itch. After playing through this game, I can say it was a quite fun puzzle game.

15963232.review:
one of the best puzzle games ever, would've been wonderful if you could create puzzles and share them in steam workshop.
also lovely rainfall, pls add thunderstorm to it <3

15959732.review:
I don't usually review games, but this one is special. A nice puzzle game that can be played either as brain workout and try to figure out where pieces go to form the final shape with logic and visualization or played by just moving things around until you get a flash of inspiration and complete the level. I prefer to just move things around but some times it's nice to try and see if you can figure what the shape is with all the pieces scattered around.

I backed this game on kickstarter so I got a couple more hours of play and I'm still not even close to level 100.

Definetly worth the price if you are into puzzle games. As was said, maybe just lower the volume a bit and it can be pretty relaxing. I wish a negative mod would be added, all that white can be blinding.

15945599.review:
Very solid puzzle game. I thought initially that 100 levels would be quick to burn through, but as of writing this review I haven't breached 30. You can see from the screenshots and trailers what kind of game this is, so if it looks like your kind of thing, you won't be disappointed.

I will say that it's not terribly relaxing unless you turn SFX down to around 15-20% (from 100%)- but after I did that, no complaints at all, definitely worth the asking price.

15943288.review:
Created by a good friend of mine and I've spent a lot more hours in the game, prior to it coming onto Steam. - Good Luck with the game John!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=75m2iMXTQ6E

LOOP is a tranquil puzzle game, with a unique, simple, meditative feel. Complete each level by swapping the hexagon pieces until all the lines link up, revealing the final pattern. Later levels introduce spinning pieces and colour changing pieces also! - Recommended!
